sentences: Võrkpallis kohtusid Tallinna ja Tartu esindus.
context: The Estonian verb 'kohtuma' means to meet, get together, or encounter someone/something. It can be used for accidental meetings (bumping into someone), planned meetings, sports competitions between teams, or observing things coming together. The word comes from 'koht' (place/position) + '-uma' suffix indicating action/movement.
